awards.text: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.

fullplot: Paul Baumer is a young German who, along with his graduating high school classmates, enlist in the German Imperial Army during the First World War. Originally thinking war would be a great adventure, Paul and his friends discover exactly the opposite as the war drags on and one by one the members of the class are killed in action until only Paul remains.
plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.
title: All Quiet on the Western Front
